import { useContext } from "react" import context from "react-bootstrap/esm/AccordionContext" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import "./topbar.css" export default function Topbar() { const {user, dispatch} = useContext(context) const handleLogout = () => { dispatch({type:'LOGOUT'}) } return (
  • HOME

  • WRITE
  • {user && "LOG OUT"}
{ user ? ( ) : (
  • LOGIN
  • REGISTER
) }
) }
